verbose_text: However, compared with the F1 controls, after Poly I : C or PAM3CSK4 infection, TLR2, TLR3, TRIF and TNFalpha gene expression were down-regulated in F1 larvae with / without continued BPA, BPF, and BPS treatments, whereas MyD88 was only down-regulated in groups with / without continued BPA and BPF exposure.
evidence: TLR3, TRIF and TNFalpha gene expression
